metadata.title: Security Shirts – Unisex Security T-Shirt for Events, Costume in Black Front and Back Print
features: Security Guard is Printed on the Front and Back of the Shirt in the Same Size Font
Used for Security Guard and Employees At Concerts, Sporting Events, Big Conventions and Gathers as well as Bouncers to name a few
Ringspun Cotton for Comfort and Flexibility. These Are Premium
This Listing is For An Adult Size Medium
description: Wwe are committed to delivering fun and modern clothing and accessories meant to offer you superior comfort and a touch of style. We are working with innovative printing technologies and premium quality materials to bring at your doorstep a wide range of clothing pieces that will surpass your expectations in terms of quality, comfort and versatility. Not completely satisfied with your order? Don’t worry, we are always at your service to address any issues or concerns.  Security Shirts for Men and Women – Comfortable and Stylish Uniform  Our security guard t-shirts are made with 100% premium quality cotton, a durable material that is super breathable, soft and lightweight, so you can enjoy amazing comfort throughout your entire shift. Featuring a plain design with front and back printing and a slim fit design, our security uniform is suitable for men and women alike, especially for events, festivals, parties, but also for Halloween costumes or themed parties.  Still not convinced? Here are some of the amazing features of this product:  100% premium quality cotton; Durable and resistant material; Long-lasting printing; Front and back “Security” print; Unisex design; Slim fit cut; Comfortable wear; Breathable and soft; Ideal for event security, party, festival, gatherings, concerts, public events or costumes for Halloween, themed parties and more; Machine washable;  For the perfect blend between comfort and style, choose the Southern Designs t-shirts!
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "7 x 7 x 1 inches; 7 Ounces", "Department": "unisex-adult", "Date First Available": "October 16, 2019", "Manufacturer": "Southern Designs"}
